deposit_instructions:
💰 Deposit Service

To complete the deposit process, please:
1. Specify the amount to deposit
2. Choose the appropriate payment method
3. Attach a transfer receipt image

Your request will be reviewed within 24 hours maximum.
withdraw_instructions:
💸 Withdrawal Service

To complete the withdrawal process, please:
1. Specify the amount to withdraw
2. Provide bank account details
3. Confirm identity as required

Your request will be processed within 48 hours maximum.
complaints_instructions:
📨 Submit Complaint

We take your complaints seriously.

Please write the complaint details with any supporting documents if available.

We will respond as soon as possible.
